character.statement: Travel to Realms to explore, build, and destroy.
Above us is your own clubhouse!
To the right there is a Pet Barn where you can adopt pets!
And to the left is the New You where you can customize your look!
You can spin the Wheel of Loot once a day.
To the far right, you can play games and make friends in the Star Arcade!
Last but not least, you can jump in your trusty blimp and go on epic adventures!
Tap your space bar to try em out.
